title: Snoop Dog was arrested for conspiracy after talking about the "Kill Trump" video?
subtitle: The fake news sites published a false allegation that the rapper (Snoop Dog) was arrested for inciting violence against President Trump.
author: David Emery
vclaim: After the launch of a music video where Bang makes a joke, The flag rifle on a clown like Donald Trump, the rapper Snoop Dog, was arrested for conspiracy by the Secret Service to suggest that "someone should do what she did with a real gun."
